content: Although this country is made up of over 17,000 islands, more than half of its population lives on the most populous island, Java. Which Southeast Asian country is it?

I believe the country you're referring to is Indonesia. It's indeed an archipelago consisting of more than 17,000 islands, and a significant portion of its population resides on the island of Java. Indonesia is also located in Southeast Asia, which matches the description you provided.
